Medium: 1 etching, printed in black; 33 photolithographs, printed in color; and 71 wood engravings cut by Théo Schmied after Matisse's designs (38 ornaments and 33 initials), printed in black
Dimensions:
page  11 1/16 x 8 7/8" (28 x 22.5 cm)
Prints:  various dimensions.
Date: 1947.  (Book commissioned in 1930, but unfinished. Prints executed 1944-1946).
Title: LES FLEURS DU MAL
